pageProps.content:
Experience

Lion Sands Narina Lodge enjoys a spectacular setting in the Kruger National Park’s Tinga Concession & overlooks the Sabie River.
The 5,000 hectares private concession invites a variety of wildlife & exciting safari activities. Guests can explore off-road driving, night drives, follow in the footsteps of a leopard, track down a herd of elephants, or simply wait for them to come to you.

Stay

Lion Sands Narina Lodge includes 9 luxury stilted suites perched among 100-year old trees overlooking the Sabie River.
Each air-conditioned suite features an en-suite bathroom with an indoor & outdoor shower as well as a private plunge pool where lazy afternoons can be spent relaxing in the sun. The suites are designed with privacy in mind, so guests can watch the animals come down to the river from their pool, viewing deck, as well as bed & bath!
The suites are linked to the central lodge area via elevated wooden walkways.
The main area features a large wooden river deck, cosy lounge & bar area, swimming pool & an outdoor boma where guests can enjoy al fresco dinners & barbeques.

Activities

Plenty of activities are available at Lion Sands Narina Lodge. The most popular is their open 4x4 game drives & bush walks. Guest can get close encounters with some of Africa’s wildest animals.
A highlight for most is spending a night in Tinyeleti Treehouse, a romantic treehouse set up in a remote corner of the bush, not too far from camp. Guests can enjoy a private dinner in their treehouse before falling asleep under the stars.
Other exciting activities include spa treatments & community initiatives.

subfolders.title: Hamiltons Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Situated within a private concession in the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Hamiltons Tented Camp takes you back to an era where grace & style were the epitome of luxurious living.  Named after Colonel Stephenson Hamilton who was instrumental in establishing the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Hamiltons Tented Camp offers guests a luxurious safari adventure in a remote & pristine bush setting. Hamiltons consists of 6 beautifully decorated tents, each equipped with an antique-styled bath & outdoor shower.  Each tent features a private viewing deck that looks out over the unspoiled bush.  From your private deck, you can enjoy the sights and sounds of the bush that derives its existence from the river.

subfolders.title: Hoyo Hoyo Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: An earthy, traditional Tsonga-styled camp, Hoyo Hoyo Safari Lodge offers a unique safari experience on the banks of the Mluwati River in the heart of the Kruger National Park. Located in a private concession, off-road game driving is permitted & guests can therefore expect close encounters with Africa’s Big 5 in a remote & pristine wilderness environment. Hoyo Hoyo aims to recreate the ambience of a bygone era, where explorers ventured out into Africa to experience the ultimate adventure.

subfolders.title: Imbali Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Situated within a private concession in the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Imbali Safari Lodge offers excellent Big 5 game viewing throughout the year. Imbali aims to provide their guests with superb hospitality, exceptional service & gastronomic excellence – ensuring an unforgettable safari experience. Imbali Safari Lodge consists of 12 luxurious suites, each with only the finest furniture & imported linen.  The suites feature en-suite bathrooms & private viewing decks with plunge pools overlooking the riverbed.

The villa is part of Lion Sands Tinga Lodge but operates & functions privately so that guests have an exclusive safari experience. subfolders.title: Pafuri Luxury Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Pafuri Luxury Tented Camp enjoys a unique & remote setting in the far north of the Kruger National Park.   The concession lies in a vast triangle between the Limpopo & Luvuhu Rivers along South Africa’s northeastern frontier.  Between them, the two great valleys embrace one of Africa’s most spectacular landscapes with mountains and gorges in the west giving way to plains, pans, baobabs and fever tree forests in the east. This land harbours an abundance of life – huge herds of elephant, buffalo & other game concentrate here, especially when the bush is eagerly awaiting the summer rains.

subfolders.title: Singita Lebombo
subfolders.description: The Singita brand of lodges offers a premier safari experience like no other!  Contemporary & luxurious in style, Singita will exceed expectations from beginning to end. The ultra-modern & beautifully decorated Singita Lebombo is located within a private concession in the Kruger National Park & boasts some of the best wildlife viewing in the country. Discerning travellers fall in love with Lebombo’s stylish interiors that carefully illuminates the textures & shades of the bush.

subfolders.title: The Outpost
subfolders.description: The Outpost boasts is set within a private concession in the Kruger National Park, on a hill overlooking the Luvuhu River.   Contemporary architecture makes use of concrete & steel with state-of-the-art retractable, remote-controlled screens offering 180 degrees of uninterrupted bush views. The Outpost features 12 open-plan en-suite luxury spaces cantilevered on a hill overlooking the river.  These private, free-standing spaces are interconnected to each other & the central lodge area by 500 meters of Zimbabwean teak walkway.
